title: Decision and Data Analytics
description: This course integrates decision and data analytics to solve real-world business problems.  It includes hands-on system modeling, data collection and analysis, and reporting writing projects.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 3133 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CS 4400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 4031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
